```json
        {
            "claims": [
                {
                    "claim_id": 1,
                    "claim_text": "Using a Panel of LLm evaluators (PoLL) composed of a larger number of smaller models outperforms a single large judge.",
                    "location": "Section 2",
                    "claim_type": "Methodology",
                    "exact_quote": "We propose instead to evaluate models using a Panel of LLm evaluators (PoLL)."
                },
                {
                    "claim_id": 2,
                    "claim_text": "PoLL exhibits less intra-model bias due to its composition of disjoint model families.",
                    "location": "Section 2",
                    "claim_type": "Methodology",
                    "exact_quote": "We find that using a Panel of LLm evaluators (PoLL) exhibits less intra-model bias due to its composition of disjoint model families."
                },
                {
                    "claim_id": 3,
                    "claim_text": "PoLL correlates better with human judgements compared to a single large judge.",
                    "location": "Section 4.1",
                    "claim_type": "Results",
                    "exact_quote": "We find that using an instantiation of PoLL correlates better with human judgements compared to a single large judge (GPT-4)."
                },
                {
                    "claim_id": 4,
                    "claim_text": "PoLL is over seven times less expensive than using GPT-4 as a judge.",
                    "location": "Section 4.5",
                    "claim_type": "Results",
                    "exact_quote": "PoLL is over seven times less expensive."
                },
                {
                    "claim_id": 5,
                    "claim_text": "PoLL is more cost-effective than GPT-4, with a cost ratio of 7 to 1.",
                    "location": "Section 4.5",
                    "claim_type": "Results",
                    "exact_quote": "PoLL is over seven times less expensive."
